h2_title: How to Complete the Snox Fox Mission
h1_content: The Snow Fox is a character you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth: Wukong. Completing her side quest will unlock a secret boss for you to take on and a unique Curio.
h2_content:
When you've beaten Non-Void, return to the fox guai near the Forest of Felicity Keeper's Shrine. Examine the body and the spirit of the fox can finally be free. By completing the mission, you'll earn the Snow Fox Brush Curio.
Snow Fox's Quest
promot:

The section summary is: The Snow Fox is a character you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth: Wukong. Completing her side quest will unlock a secret boss for you to take on and a unique Curio. This excerpt merges content from both the main and sub-sections. The sub-section is titled 'How to Complete the Snox Fox Mission', and the detailed content is as follows:
When you've beaten Non-Void, return to the fox guai near the Forest of Felicity Keeper's Shrine. Examine the body and the spirit of the fox can finally be free. By completing the mission, you'll earn the Snow Fox Brush Curio.
